title: StormStack - Cloudflare Worker Generate (Generator)
description: ☁️ Generate a Cloudflare Worker project using the provided parameters.

example.description: Run release process for version 2.3.4-beta.0 and publish to NPM.

name.description: Identifier for the worker (do not include `workers-` prefix).
name.x-prompt: What is the name of the worker?

directory.description: The directory of the new application.

route.description: Route for the worker (including leading slash).

minify.description: Minify the bundled script before deploying.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests.

tags.description: Add tags to the application (used for linting).

frontendProject.description: Frontend project that needs to access this application. This sets up proxy configuration.

swcJest.description: Use `@swc/jest` instead `ts-jest` for faster test compilation.

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.

setParserOptionsProject.description: Whether or not to configure the ESLint `parserOptions.project` option. We do not do this by default for lint performance reasons.

bundler.description: Bundler which is used to package the application

e2eTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for end to end (e2e) tests
